DOC.brief_summary: Aim : To compare prospectively two bariatric surgery technique : sleeve gastrectomy ( SG ) v gastric bypass ( GB ) evolution nonalcoholic fatty liver disease ( NAFLD ) measure transient elastography first year . Methods : This randomized clinical trial morbidly obese patient , 18-60 year old Federal Hospital , Ministry Health , Brazil . Patients divide 2 group : group 1 - SG ( n = 30 ) group 2 - GB ( n = 30 ) . The randomization make lot . In GB investigator create 30 ml pouch , pancreatic alimentary limb 1 meter , calibrate gastroenterostomy ( 1.5 cm diameter ) . In SG investigator calibrate gastric tube bougie number 32 ( 70 ml ) . The variable compare one week surgery postoperative time ( 1 , 3 , 6 12 month ) . The variable : patient anthropometry , laboratory test transient liver elastography .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Bariatric Surgery Evolution Nonalcoholic Fatty Liver Disease : Comparative Clinical Trial Between Sleeve Gastrectomy Gastric Bypass
DOC.criteria: The eligibility criterion : morbid obesity patient grade II grade III ( BMI > 35 ) prepare bariatric surgery . The exclusion criterion : age 18 year great 65 year old , chronic disease ( heart failure , chronic liver disease ) , alcohol abuse ( abuse consider consume 14 drink per week ) .
